traits.Keen Sight: The hawk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
traits.Pack Tactics: The hawk has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hawk's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.Beak: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
